org.tantalum.net.xml

Class RSSItem

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.tantalum.net.xml.RSSItem

  • public class RSSItem
extends java.lang.Object
    RSS Item object, associated with RSSModel which is a list of such objects. This class is thread safe. You can and should externally synchronized on this object to access multiple fields without risk that they will be changed by background updates.

        public java.lang.String getTruncatedTitle(java.lang.Object font,
                                 int width)
        Get the item title, shortened to fit within the specified pixel width with the specified font. This is for J2ME only and will throw a runtime exception on other platforms.
